Title: The Fashion Show
Plot: It's the start of term and Carli is organising a charity fashion show, and like every school fashion show it's only for the coolest and best looking kids. This means our four heroes aren't involved - or at least not until the last minute when Carli's desperate, but their help proves to be a bigger hindrance than anyone could have imagined.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual content that may offend
